abilities.name: Grind Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, attach up to 3 in any combination of Fire and Metal Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powerful Axe
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
